decisions: Manual scaffolding for full control over config
Tailwind v3 (not v4) for shadcn/ui compatibility
include_str! for SQL migrations in Rust
Indexes on foreign keys for query performance
Readonly core types matching append-only data model
result.summary: Scaffolded complete Tauri v2 + React 19 + TypeScript strict project. Configured Vite, ESLint flat config, Prettier, Tailwind v3 + shadcn/ui with dark theme HSL vars from PLAN.md, Zustand, neverthrow, lucide-react. Rust backend with git2-rs (vendored), tauri-plugin-sql (SQLite), dialog, notification, shell plugins. SQLite schema with all 4 tables (projects, agent_sessions, messages, app_settings) + indexes. Feature-based directory structure. All checks pass: tsc --noEmit, cargo build, cargo clippy, vitest (3/3), vite build.
